price: Dan di antara mereka ada yang buta huruf, tidak mengetahui Alkitab (Taurat), kecuali dongengan bohong belaka67 dan mereka hanya menduga-duga.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُمۡ أُمِّيُّونَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّآ أَمَانِيَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ
footnotes: 67.  Kebanyakan bangsa Yahudi itu buta huruf dan tidak mengetahui isi Taurat, selain dari dongeng­dongeng yang diceritakan pendeta-pendeta mereka.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum ummiyyūna lā yaʿlamūna al-kitāba illā amāniyya wa-in hum illā yaẓunnūna
